scripts.postversion: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.release:patch: cd api && npm run release:patch && cd .. && npm version --no-git-tag-version --force patch
scripts.release:minor: cd api && npm run release:minor && cd .. && npm version --no-git-tag-version --force minor
scripts.release:major: cd api && npm run release:major && cd .. && npm version --no-git-tag-version --force major
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator -u kalisio -p kapp && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.cordova:remove:android: cd cordova && cordova platform remove android && cd ..
scripts.cordova:remove:ios: cd cordova && cordova platform remove ios && cd ..
scripts.cordova:remove: npm run cordova:remove:android && npm run cordova:remove:ios
scripts.cordova:clean: cd cordova && cordova clean remove ios && cd ..
scripts.cordova:add:android: cd cordova && envsub -s dollar-both config.xml.tpl config.xml && cordova platform add android@~7.1.1 && cd ..
scripts.cordova:add:ios: cd cordova && envsub -s dollar-both config.xml.tpl config.xml && cordova platform add ios@~5.0.0 && cd ..
scripts.cordova:add: npm run cordova:add:android && npm run cordova:add:ios
scripts.cordova:build: npm run cordova:build:debug && npm run cordova:build:release
scripts.cordova:build:android: npm run cordova:add:android && npm run cordova:build:release
scripts.cordova:build:ios: npm run cordova:add:ios && npm run cordova:build:release
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:stats && npm run analyze:treemap
scripts.test:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=production testcafe chrome:headless test/*.test.js -f Basic --app "npm run prod" --app-init-delay 10000 -S -s screenshots
